tidbits.title: Alpine Scenery
tidbits.description: Switzerland is renowned for its stunning alpine scenery, with majestic peaks, crystal-clear lakes, and picturesque villages attracting nature enthusiasts and adventurers.

tidbits.title: Multilingual Society
tidbits.description: The country has four official languages—German, French, Italian, and Romansh—showcasing its cultural diversity and offering distinct regional experiences.

tidbits.title: Financial Hub
tidbits.description: Switzerland is a global financial hub, known for its stability, banking sector, and hosting international organizations like the United Nations and the Red Cross.
